title: Frida Baby The 3-Step Cradle Cap System | DermaFrida The FlakeFixer | Sponge, Brush, Comb and Storage Stand for Babies with Cradle Cap
description: Did you know that almost 70% of babies end up with crusty cradle cap? Give flakes the brush off with our Flake Fixer - the first 3-step system specially designed to fix the flake situation. First LATHER (with sponge), then LOOSEN (with brush) and LIFT (with comb) then get back to baby with more cradle, less cap.
